<!-- About -->
|vo_05_01_title          = About {name}:  Body Language
|vo_05_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Body Language.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx             = Sometimes, you can convey more with dance than words. If you don't know what to say, then just dance.
|vo_05_01_mention        = 
|vo_05_02_title          = About {name}: Dance and Wisdom
|vo_05_02_friendship     = 4
|vo_05_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Dance and Wisdom.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx             = You need an extreme amount of talent to pursue knowledge and wisdom. Many people throw their entire lives into it, only to end up burned out and depressed... Dance isn't like that. You don't have to understand what you're seeing to enjoy watching it. If I can use my movements to demonstrate the beauty and meaning of dance, then I'm happy.
|vo_05_02_mention        = 

<!-- About Us -->
|vo_06_01_title          = About Us: Dealing with Anger
|vo_06_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Dealing with Anger.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx             = Are you sulking? That's no good — c'mon, follow my lead. First, use your right hand to draw a biiig circle in front of you. Then, use both hands to take all those negative feelings off your chest and into the circle. Next, push it away as hard as you can! So? Feeling better now?
|vo_06_01_mention        = 
|vo_06_02_title          = About Us: Going on Adventures
|vo_06_02_friendship     = 4
|vo_06_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Going on Adventures.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx             = I've never left [[Sumeru City]], but... I want to go on adventures with you. Going to new places will be fine as long as I can adjust... Umm, quick question: [[Inazuma]]'s beaches won't have huge sandworms that'll suddenly jump out at us, right?
|vo_06_02_mention        = 

<!-- Miscellany I -->
|vo_07_01_title          = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_friendship     = 4
|vo_07_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx             = I received my Vision when I debuted on stage. If even the goddess was willing to watch my performance, then that must mean she had acknowledged the beauty of human-made art.
|vo_07_01_mention        = 
|vo_07_02_title          = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx             = It's normal for hard work to produce no results. For example, no matter how hard I try, I can never understand the Rtawahists' teachings. When you're stuck, shake up your mind, flip your brain around, and change the direction you're going in.
|vo_07_02_mention        = 
|vo_07_03_title          = Interesting Things: Dance of the Crystalflies
|vo_07_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things - Dance of the Crystalflies.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx             = [[Crystalflies]] come in all sorts of colors. They're so pretty that you can't not be curious. When you quietly reach out to one, it instantly steps into an elegant and nimble dance, and flies away from you. Hehe, if I could fly, I'd take dance lessons from them.
|vo_07_03_mention        = 
|vo_07_04_title          = Interesting Things: Padisarahs
|vo_07_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things - Padisarahs.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx             = When the [[Goddess of Flowers]] danced, real [[Padisarah]]s would bloom underneath her feet. That sounds like such a beautiful scene. I'd love to see it.
|vo_07_04_mention        = Goddess of Flowers

<!-- About Teammates -->
|vo_08_01_title          = About [[Cyno]]
|vo_08_01_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Cyno.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx             = I don't really like interacting with people from the Akademiya because they don't view the arts too kindly. I often wonder what they do when they're bored... Huh, Cyno plays [[Genius Invokation TCG]]? I can't believe it...
|vo_08_01_mention        = Cyno
|vo_08_02_title          = About [[Tighnari]]
|vo_08_02_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Tighnari.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx             = I hear he's a really talented botanist. He must be good at telling apart mushrooms. At least, he would never have to worry about eating a poisonous one... I'm so jealous.
|vo_08_02_mention        = Tighnari
|vo_08_03_title          = About [[Collei]]
|vo_08_03_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Collei.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx             = She sometimes comes to watch my performances. She's a really hard-working Trainee Forest Ranger. One time, she warned me about getting lost. What did she mean by that? It's not like I've gotten lost before...
|vo_08_03_mention        = Collei
|vo_08_04_title          = About [[Kaveh]]
|vo_08_04_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Kaveh.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx             = I heard he was the one who built the magnificent [[Palace of Alcazarzaray]]. He must have had a wonderful time making such a masterpiece, like when I'm in the middle of dance practice. Just thinking about dancing for everyone gives me so much happiness and motivation.
|vo_08_04_mention        = Kaveh
|vo_08_05_title          = About [[Dehya]]
|vo_08_05_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_05_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Dehya.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx             = It's hard to believe that so many things have happened recently... I wanted to pick out a good present for Dehya and Dunyarzad, but I just can't make up my mind. Everyone at the Grand Bazaar has given me many suggestions, but if I took them all, it'd be too much... What should I do...
|vo_08_05_mention        = Dehya,Dunyarzad
|vo_08_06_title          = About [[Dori]]
|vo_08_06_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_06_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Dori.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx             = The big-spending merchant Dori has watched me dance before. I remember that she talked with [[Sheikh Zubayr|Mr. Zubayr]] once, and then never came back. Did something happen? ...Huh? She wanted me to go on tour around Teyvat? No way, Mr. Zubayr definitely would've refused for me! ...Ahh, please tell me he has...
|vo_08_06_mention        = Dori,Sheikh Zubayr
|vo_08_07_title          = About [[Lesser Lord Kusanali]]
|vo_08_07_friendship     = 4
|vo_08_07_file           = VO_{language}{character} About Lesser Lord Kusanali.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx             = The people of the Great Bazaar love Lesser Lord Kusanali. I'd love to hear her thoughts on my Dance of Sabzeruz... Oh, no, no, forget it... If she were in the audience, I'd get stage fright...
|vo_08_07_mention        = Lesser Lord Kusanali

<!-- More About -->
|vo_09_01_title          = More About {name}: I
|vo_09_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx             = Aaagh! Sorry, I'm trying to decide what to eat, and I got lost in thought. Hee-hee, do you need help with anything?
|vo_09_01_mention        = 
|vo_09_02_title          = More About {name}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship     = 3
|vo_09_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx             = My teacher taught me everything there is to know about dance, but she said that the most important thing is putting feeling into your movements. Only then can you move your audience and convey emotion. To express beauty, I must first become the embodiment of beauty.
|vo_09_02_mention        = 
|vo_09_03_title          = More About {name}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship     = 4
|vo_09_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx             = Sometimes, I receive letters from showgoers who say that my dancing has cheered them up. I always share this kind of happy news with everyone at Zubayr Theater. Even though I'm the one the audience sees on the stage, it's because of everyone's collective efforts that I can stand up there in the first place.
|vo_09_03_mention        = 
|vo_09_04_title          = More About {name}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship     = 5
|vo_09_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx             = The Grand Bazaar occasionally hosts other kinds of performances, such as juggling showcases. I've tried juggling before, but I always end up catching the balls with my head... Mr. Zubayr and everyone else just laughed at me. They probably thought I had really good hand-eye coordination. Hee-hee, I've been exposed.
|vo_09_04_mention        = Sheikh Zubayr
|vo_09_05_title          = More About {name}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship     = 6
|vo_09_05_file           = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx             = Someone once told me that I was like a shining oasis that restored life and happiness to others with its warmth. That was nice of them to say, and I was happy to hear it, but... what I want to show people is much more than that. After spending so much time with you, though, I finally understand how it feels to have someone care for and look after you. Now... Now, I feel like that comparison is a far better one for you.
|vo_09_05_mention        =

|vo_10_01_title          = {name}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx             = "My life is dance," or "dance is my life"... Which phrase is the better way to describe it? Agh, I'm no good at logical things like this. Anyway, I'll just keep on dancing. I want to use my performances to show the beauty of art to more people.
|vo_10_01_mention        =

|vo_10_02_file           = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg

|vo_10_02_mention        =

|vo_10_03_file           = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg

|vo_10_03_mention        =

|vo_10_04_file           = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg

|vo_10_04_mention        =

|vo_12_01_file           = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
